title: Get Products Request
description: Request parameters for discovering or refining advertising products. buying_mode declares the buyer's intent: 'brief' for curated discovery, 'wholesale' for raw catalog access, or 'refine' to iterate on known products and proposals.

buying_mode.description: Declares buyer intent for this request. 'brief': publisher curates product recommendations from the provided brief. 'wholesale': buyer requests raw inventory to apply their own audiences â€” brief must not be provided, and proposals are omitted. 'refine': iterate on products and proposals from a previous get_products response using the refine object.

brief.description: Natural language description of campaign requirements. Required when buying_mode is 'brief'. Must not be provided when buying_mode is 'wholesale' or 'refine'.

refine.description: Refinement payload for iterating on products and proposals from a previous get_products response. Each product declares an explicit action: include (keep with optional adjustments), omit (exclude), or more_like_this (find similar). Only valid when buying_mode is 'refine'.

overall.description: Overall direction for the refinement (e.g., 'more video options', 'increase emphasis on premium inventory'). Guides the seller to adjust the set composition beyond specific product instructions.

products.description: Per-product refinement instructions. Each entry references a product from a previous get_products response and declares an action.

product_id.description: Product ID from a previous get_products response

action.description: 'include': return this product with updated pricing and data. 'omit': exclude this product from the response. 'more_like_this': find additional products similar to this one (the original is also returned).

notes.description: Adjustment instructions. For 'include': specific changes to request. For 'more_like_this': what 'similar' means. Ignored when action is 'omit'.

proposals.description: Per-proposal refinement instructions. Reference proposal IDs from a previous get_products response.

proposal_id.description: Proposal ID from a previous get_products response

omit.description: Remove this proposal from the response. When true, notes is ignored.

notes.description: Adjustment instructions for this proposal (e.g., 'shift more budget toward video', 'reduce total by 10%')

brand.description: Brand reference for product discovery context. Resolved to full brand identity at execution time.

catalog.description: Catalog of items the buyer wants to promote. The seller matches catalog items against its inventory and returns products where matches exist. Supports all catalog types: a job catalog finds job ad products, a product catalog finds sponsored product slots. Reference a synced catalog by catalog_id, or provide inline items.

account.description: Account for product lookup. Returns products with pricing specific to this account's rate card.

buyer_campaign_ref.description: Buyer's campaign reference label. Groups related discovery and buy operations under a single campaign for CRM and ad server correlation (e.g., 'NovaDrink_Meals_Q2').

property_list.description: [AdCP 3.0] Reference to an externally managed property list. When provided, the sales agent should filter products to only those available on properties in the list.
